name: Pizza Guy Vs. The Army of Darkness
name_original: Pizza Guy Vs. The Army of Darkness
description:
You play as Pizza Guy, the coolest pizza around. Help him deal with toppings that shouldn't belong on pizza. 

Pizza guy is so cool that he doesn't need to jump or even attack. He just moves left and right.

We used multiple mechanics but we focused on only the movement of the player to the left or the right. 

Themes: Food, Gravity

Developed for OMGJAM4. 

Team: ColbP, Haydern
